description: Unified GPU-enabled ecoacoustics environment for Florida Everglades Soundscape Project. Built on Python 3.10, CuPy CUDA12x, and PyTorch CUDA 12.1. Supports GPU-accelerated acoustic indices, spectrogram generation, and CNN-based species detection.

cupy.notes: Uses CUDA runtime from NVIDIA driver; CUDA_PATH warning expected on Windows.

pytorch.install_command: pip install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu121

ecoacoustics_usage.notes: All pipelines operated under the ecosound environment to ensure reproducibility.

notes: Only Python 3.10 supports CuPy GPU wheels on Windows.
ecosound is the unified environment replacing env_indices, env_saturation, env_falsecolor, and env_species.
Environment designed for SM4 stereo ecoacoustics pipelines and Everglades long-term monitoring.
